Bash(python3 -c "
from base64 import b64decode
import os

# Minimal 1x1 transparent PNG
png_data = b64decode\(''iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAADUlEQVR42mNk+M9QDwADhgGAWjR9awAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==''\)

assets_dir = r''C:\\Temp\\tsscat\\DefaultApp\\DefaultApp\\Assets''
files = [''StoreLogo.png'', ''Square150x150Logo.png'', ''Square44x44Logo.png'', ''Wide310x150Logo.png'', ''SplashScreen.png'']

for f in files:
    with open\(os.path.join\(assets_dir, f\), ''wb''\) as fp:
        fp.write\(png_data\)
    print\(f''Created {f}''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" pr create --base main --head 0.5 --title "Release Version 1.1" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Version 1.1

This PR merges the 0.5 development branch into main, releasing version 1.1 of Default App.

### What''s New in 1.1

- Added splash screen
- Added information window
- Added Test Audio button to Operating System card
- Added Network Information card with ping diagnostics:
  - Default Gateway with Ping test
  - DNS Server with Ping test
  - Google DNS \(8.8.8.8\) for external connectivity verification
- Added BIOS & Security card
- Added TPM Information card
- Enhanced UI with theme support \(System Default, Inverted, Dark, Cyberpunk, High Contrast\)
- Added copy-to-clipboard buttons for key fields
- Removed unused code
- Fixed bugs

### Technical Changes

- Updated to version 1.1.0.0 in Package.appxmanifest and csproj
- Comprehensive README with feature documentation
- MSIX package signed with Azure Trusted Signing \(Big Hat Group Inc.\)

## Test Plan

- [ ] Verify all information cards display correctly
- [ ] Test ping functionality for Gateway, DNS, and Google DNS
- [ ] Verify theme switching works
- [ ] Test copy-to-clipboard buttons
- [ ] Verify MSIX installs and runs correctly

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")
